name: Learn To Unlearn
description:
Play as a stranger, traveling in a strange land after his death. Find out what values he has to unlearn in his life and prepare for rebirth. Use WASD to move, SHIFT to run and SPACE to climb obstacles. Press E to interact with the world. Since the strange land is full of mist.  Press Q to focus out to clear the view for a second. Remember only one second, and wait for your focus to refill. Happy traveling in this nameless strange land. Thanks in advance for your support.

Note :  Recent  testers of the game felt the puzzles a little tough or not clear. so it is recommend to watch the full gameplay video if you stuck anywhere in the game.

Theme :

Unlearn has been picked has the main theme for the game. One Second is also  slightly implemented into the focus mechanics.
